__e: If she doesn't die in here, she almost certainly will when she returns to her village, and all you'll have achieved is humiliating Will and us.
you couldn't go to your made and cry on her shoulders, you couldn't go into the village and complain about your feelings, it was like selling yourself to someone, you just couldn't.
Hey, that guy's gotta be running somewhere... maybe we're near a village and I bet that village has a market!
Does anyone need a lift to their village?
If you return, there'll be a feast. You'll be the main course!
We had the opportunity to go and see a thousand-year-old village.
